name: Super Helpful Man (itch)
description:
Super Helpful Man An Old Man Super Hero Handy Man Simulator The Roy Hardcastle Story - LD VERSION

Super Helpful Man is a point and click adventure where our hero is running out of super power. His power? The Power of Handiness!

Help Super Helpful Man finish a few more oddjobs before he completely runs out of power via fun and easy to play adventure game mechanics.

The game features full voice acting for a fun cast of characters so make sure your sound is on.

Note: The intro turned out a little long so bear with it!

All content created in 72 hours except for 2 pieces of music, which we did write but were written prior to the jam.

An entirely new version is being create for release on Steam
